channel.title: Help with making a dropdown from a list
channel.description:
hey guys I have a plaintext output of "active" categorys and their id's into a text file I need to make a dropdown from that list that associates the category name with the category id without the use mysql. is this possible?
the list is logically laid out like so:
CatName CatID CatName CatID CatName CatID CatName CatID

$category_array = split("\n", file_get_contents("the.categories"));
for($i = 0; $i < sizeof($category_array); $i = $i + 2){
    $category_name = $category_array[$i];
    $categoty_id = $category_array[$i + 1];
